The Federal Election Commission: FEC) conducted an investigation into campaign contributions made to Vern Buchanan's 2006 and 2008 campaigns.
The investigation focused on allegations: business partners, and their family members made contributions to Buchanan's campaigns and were reimbursed by the companies.
Buchanan: s spokesperson issued a news release declaring that the FEC had "completely exonerated" Buchanan, stating that the accusations against him were exposed as dishonest and partisan attacks.
